            table,

            values,
            rows=index,
            cols=columns,
            aggfunc=aggfunc,
            observed=dropna,
            margins_name=margins_name,

        table = table.T

    if isinstance(table, DataFrame) and dropna:
        table = table.dropna(how="all", axis=1)
